long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EMAIL TRACKING WITHOUT COMPROMISES
Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business is a free email tracking extension for Gmail that will let you know when your emails have been read, and if and when any links in your emails have been clicked on.  It is 100% free and requires no signup— just install and start tracking your Gmail today!

YOUR PRIVACY MAINTAINED
We value your privacy.  We don't require you to create an account with us, or provide us with credit card information, because Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business is free to use.  After installing the extension, we do require you to Login with Google so that we can connect your sent mails to your Gmail account.

SAFE AND SECURE
We only store information about the emails you send and the links in those emails.  We will not sell this information or share it with any other company for any purpose.  All information transmitted to and from the Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business servers is encrypted at all times.

SEAMLESS INTEGRATION
Once installed, Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business works silently and seamlessly in the background whenever you use Gmail.  You do not have to change how you send your emails: Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business handles everything for you automatically.

NO VISIBLE CHANGES
Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business works without visibly modifying your emails.  We don't append a signature or logo to your emails.

EASY TO REMOVE
If you want to stop tracking your emails, you can uninstall Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business at any time and no further tracking will occur.  If you reinstall the extension later on the same Gmail account, you will have access to all your previous tracking information again.

TRY IT TODAY
There's no limit to the number of emails you can track with Email Tracking for Sales and Small Business.  Give it a try today!
